span.div: Mission Statement: Preparing today's students for tomorrow's world! Vision Statement: It is the vision of the Dublin Independent School District, in partnership with the community, to develop life-long learners who becomeproductive citizens in an ever changing 21stcentury global society.

span.strong: April 20, 2020 DISD Board Meeting @ 6 p.m. via Facebook live.
Parents and students: Due to the current situation with Covid-19, Parent Portal will not be accessible. Grades will be posted in May.

Governor Greg Abbott has announced that all schools in Texas will be closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We will continue to follow the guidelines set by the State of Texas officals. We want to thank the parents and guardians of our DISD students for the support and understanding you have shown. We will continue to notify you of any changes and updates as they occur. Stay safe!

Breakfast and lunch will be provided at the Intermediate campus for students from 8:30-10 a.m.Breakfast and Lunch are being delivered on bus routes beginning at 8:30 a.m. Instructional Packets are being mailed to students on Mondays. You can also access the packets on the campus webpages.

h2.a: Cybersecurity Warning for Staff and Parents

strong.span: DUBLIN ISD ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE.
